00026 void IImport::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *options) {
00027 
00028     string key = "options.iimport";
00029     _TI_tag = options->get(key+".TI_tag").as< string >();
00030 
00031     cout << endl << "... ... Using TI XML tag '" << _TI_tag << "'" << flush;
00032 }
00033 
00034 bool IImport::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00035 
00036     string PARDIR = "frame" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId());
00037     string SUBDIR = PARDIR + "/pair_0000_0000";
00038 
00039     QMNBList &nblist = top->NBList();
00040     QMNBList ::iterator nit;
00041 
00042     for (nit = nblist.begin(); nit != nblist.end(); ++nit) {
00043         string ID1  = boost::lexical_cast<string>((*nit)->Seg1()->getId());
00044         string ID2  = boost::lexical_cast<string>((*nit)->Seg2()->getId());
00045 
00046         SUBDIR = PARDIR + "/pair_" + ID1 + "_" + ID2 + "/TI.xml";
00047         this->XML2PairTI(*nit, SUBDIR);
00048     }
00049 }
00050 
00051 void IImport::XML2PairTI(QMPair *qmpair, string &xmlDirFile) {
00052 
00053     printf("\n... ... Import TIs for pair %5d (ID1 %4d    ID2 %4d) ",
00054             qmpair->getId(), qmpair->Seg1()->getId(), qmpair->Seg2()->getId());
00055 
00056     string TRANSPORT = "electron_or_hole";
00057     int    STATE     = 0;
00058     
00059     std::string line;
00060     std::ifstream intt;
00061     intt.open(xmlDirFile.c_str());
00062 
00063     if (intt.is_open() ) {
00064         while ( intt.good() ) {
00065 
00066             std::getline(intt, line);
00067             vector<string> split;
00068             Tokenizer toker(line, " \t<>=\"");
00069             toker.ToVector(split);
00070 
00071             if (split.size() < 3) {
00072                 continue;
00073             }
00074 
00075 //            cout << split.size() << " " << flush;
00076 //            vector<string> ::iterator sit;
00077 //            for (sit = split.begin(); sit < split.end(); ++sit) {
00078 //                cout << (*sit) << " " << flush;
00079 //            }
00080 
00081             if      (split[0] == "transport") {
00082                 assert(split[1] == "name");
00083                 TRANSPORT = split[2];
00084             }
00085             else if (split[0] == _TI_tag) {
00086                 assert(TRANSPORT == "electron" || TRANSPORT == "hole");
00087                 STATE = (TRANSPORT == "electron") ? -1 : +1;
00088                 if (_TI_tag == "J" || _TI_tag == "T_00") {
00089                     double J = boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
00090                     qmpair->setJeff2(J*J, STATE);
00091                     printf("\n... ... ... J2(State = %+1d) = %4.7e",
00092                             STATE, qmpair->getJeff2(STATE));
00093                 }
00094                 else if (_TI_tag == "J_sq_degen" || _TI_tag == "J_sq_boltz") {
00095                     double J2 = boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
00096                     qmpair->setJeff2(J2, STATE);
00097                     printf("\n... ... ... J2(State = %+1d) = %4.7e",
00098                             STATE, qmpair->getJeff2(STATE));
00099                 }
00100             }
00101         } /* Exit loop over lines */
00102     }
00103     else { cout << endl
00104                 << "... ... ... ERROR: No TI.xml in pair folder. Skip..."
00105                 << flush;
00106     }
00107 
00108     intt.close();
00109 
00110 }
00111
